name: A Feeble Saga
description: You begin as an aspiring adventurer, visiting a remote village in need of a hero. Your quest to become their hero will take you farther than you ever expected. Journey across the land and discover the hero inside yourself you never knew.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Any graphics card with SM 4.0 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 or better Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or better DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 700 MB available space
